definitions.definition: Any of several different forms of the same protein , arising from either single nucleotide polymorphisms , differential splicing of mRNA , or post-translational modifications (e.g. sulfation , glycosylation , etc.)

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) Any of several different forms of the same protein , arising from either single nucleotide polymorphisms , differential splicing of mRNA , or post-translational modifications (e.g. sulfation , glycosylation , etc.)
